name: data-table-column-pin
title: DataTable Column Pin
description: Column header option to pin columns to left or right.

files.content: "use client" import type { Column } from "@tanstack/react-table" import { Check, CircleHelp, Pin, PinOff } from "lucide-react" import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button" import { DropdownMenu, DropdownMenuContent, DropdownMenuItem, DropdownMenuLabel, DropdownMenuSeparator, DropdownMenuTrigger, } from "@/components/ui/dropdown-menu" import { Tooltip, TooltipContent, TooltipTrigger, } from "@/components/ui/tooltip" import { cn } from "@/lib/utils" /** * Dropdown menu items for pinning a column. * Use inside a DropdownMenuContent or as a child of TableColumnActions. * * @example * ```tsx * // Inside TableColumnActions * * * * ``` */ export function TableColumnPinOptions({ column, withSeparator = true, }: { column: Column /** Whether to render a separator before the options. Defaults to true. */ withSeparator?: boolean }) { const canPin = column.getCanPin() const isPinned = column.getIsPinned() if (!canPin) return null return ( <> {withSeparator && } Column Pin Pin column to left or right side column.pin("left")} className={cn( "flex items-center", isPinned === "left" && "bg-accent text-accent-foreground", )} > Pin to Left {isPinned === "left" && } column.pin("right")} className={cn( "flex items-center", isPinned === "right" && "bg-accent text-accent-foreground", )} > Pin to Right {isPinned === "right" && } {isPinned && ( column.pin(false)} className="flex items-center" > Unpin )} ) } /** * Standalone dropdown menu for pinning a column. * Shows a pin button that opens a dropdown with pin options. * * @example * ```tsx * // Standalone usage * * ``` */ export function TableColumnPinMenu({ column, className, }: { column: Column className?: string }) { const canPin = column.getCanPin() const isPinned = column.getIsPinned() if (!canPin) return null return ( Column Pin Pin column to left or right side column.pin("left")} className={cn( "flex items-center", isPinned === "left" && "bg-accent text-accent-foreground", )} > Pin to Left {isPinned === "left" && } column.pin("right")} className={cn( "flex items-center", isPinned === "right" && "bg-accent text-accent-foreground", )} > Pin to Right {isPinned === "right" && } column.pin(false)} className="flex items-center" > Unpin ) } /** @deprecated Use `TableColumnPinMenu` instead */ export const TableColumnPin = TableColumnPinMenu TableColumnPinOptions.displayName = "TableColumnPinOptions" TableColumnPinMenu.displayName = "TableColumnPinMenu"
